name: Tascha
description: Tascha is the Founder and CEO of INFINIT, the first DeFi abstraction layer that lets you launch and scale DeFi protocols in minutes. INIT Capital, a liquidity hook money market, was launched based on INFINIT DeFi abstraction layer as a POC and GTM for INFINIT. Previously, Tascha founded Alpha Finance and was the first to introduce leveraged yield farming through Alpha Homora product
